thread.title: MBMarsh
thread.title_full: Today Lending LLC 208565 reviewed by MBMarsh

author: MBMarsh
title: MBMarsh
text: Chris and his team at Today Lending did a phenomenal job not only with getting the best rate, but the processing of the loan, and providing Outstanding customer service. This purchasing experience was challenging for me as seller/buyer, but Chris handled all the intricacies and smoothly and seamlessly made it look easy. Well Done!
